title: [LFM] Silver-Gold all roles accepted
body:
We are a ranked team looking for lots of gold-silver players. We are all experienced from season 3 and are ready to climb to plat+ with you guys.

Add Aiox and xxswaglanexx for more information! Thanks!

replies.body: Ye contact me add my main (drizzer) but i be on my smurf ( RNG Uzi Fanboy) ty
